text: Linnea Eleanor "Bunny" Yeager (March 13, 1929 â€“ May 25, 2014) was an American photographer and pin-up model. She was known for taking pictures of Bettie Page for Playboy magazine and for taking pictures of naked women during the 1960s. Yeager was born in Wilkinsburg, Pennsylvania. Yeager died from congestive heart failure in Miami, Florida, aged 85. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:American photographers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Models from Pennsylvania
title: Bunny Yeager
